languages.text: "Я даю вам последний шанс исправить свою ошибку и уничтожить чудовище. Или это сделаю я".
"I am giving you one last chance to correct your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else I will do it myself."
languages.original_text: "Я даю вам последний шанс исправить свою ошибку и уничтожить чудовище. Или это сделаю я".

traits.locale_text: "I am giving you one last chance to amend your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else I will do it myself."
"I am giving you one last chance to amend your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else I will do it myself."
"I am giving you one last chance to amend your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else, I will do it myself."
"I am giving you one last chance to amend your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else, I will do it myself."
"I am giving you one last chance to correct your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else I will do it myself."
"I am giving you one last chance to correct your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else I will do it myself."

languages.text: « Je vous laisse une dernière chance de réparer votre erreur et de détruire ce monstre. Sinon, je m'en chargerai moi-même. »
languages.original_text: "I am giving you one last chance to correct your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else I will do it myself."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous laisse une dernière chance de réparer votre erreur et de détruire ce monstre. Sinon, je m'en chargerai moi-même. »

languages.text: «Le estoy dando una última oportunidad de subsanar su error y destruir al monstruo. Si no, me encargaré yo mismo».
languages.original_text: "I am giving you one last chance to correct your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else I will do it myself."

traits.locale_text: «Le estoy dando una última oportunidad de subsanar su error y destruir al monstruo. Si no, me encargaré yo mismo».

languages.text: “我最后给你一次机会，让你弥补过错，消灭这只怪物。否则，我就要亲自动手了。”
languages.original_text: "I am giving you one last chance to correct your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else I will do it myself."

traits.locale_text: “我最后给你一次机会，让你弥补过错，消灭这只怪物。否则，我就要亲自动手了。”

languages.text: "Ich gebe Euch noch eine letzte Chance, Euren Fehler zu korrigieren und das Monster zu vernichten. Ansonsten tue ich es selbst."
languages.original_text: "I am giving you one last chance to correct your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else I will do it myself."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe noch eine letzte Chance, Euren Fehler zu korrigieren und das Monster zu vernichten. Ansonsten tue ich es selbst."

languages.text: 「過ちを正し、怪物を破壊する最後のチャンスを与えよう。お前がなさねば、私がそれを行う」
languages.original_text: "I am giving you one last chance to correct your mistake and destroy the monster. Or else I will do it myself."

traits.locale_text: 「過ちを正し、怪物を破壊する最後のチャンスを与えよう。お前がなさねば、私がそれを行う」
